title.rendered: TTE wins Highly commended award for CSR Initiative of the Year

content.rendered: Celebrating excellence in the mechanical, electrical and plumbing sector, the MEP Awards 2023 were held in Dubai recently. TTE participated by sending its entry for the CSR Initiative of the Year Award. The campaign was A Dirham A Day, ESAG’s annual drive that takes place during Ramadan. Employees across all ESAG entities are encouraged to donate at least one dirham each day, and at the end of the month select blue collar employees receive the donations. Over 28,000 dirhams were collected in 2023 and dispersed amongst 36 staff across entities. With over 700 blue-collar workers as part of its workforce, TTE team members enthusiastically participated in the campaign, thereby adding smiles to the lives of an integral part of the workforce.
